titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to limit the terms of office for Representatives and Senators in Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution.

bill.summary: 1/21/1997--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Prohibits a person from serving more than four consecutive terms as Representative or two consecutive terms as Senator, not counting any term that began before the adoption of this article of amendment.
